name: undedicated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not believing that something is very important and therefore not giving a lot of time and energy to it: Younger people are often playing the guitar or drums for fun and are too inexperienced or undedicated. The situation actually provided the opportunity to clear their rolls of undedicated members.
not designed to be used for one particular purpose: She has warned that there will not be a big pile of undedicated money awaiting legislators. The desert is an undedicated expanse.
More examplesFewer examplesYou find out which players are really dedicated and which ones aren't - and you have to get the undedicated ones off your team.Because there are far more undedicated gamers than dedicated ones, any console that can appeal to the former will outsell the latter.Defence lawyers portrayed her mother as manipulative, unreliable, and undedicated.Any unused money would return to the pot of undedicated grants.
